query:
SELECT
                c.chat_id AS "chat_id: _"
            FROM chat c
            LEFT JOIN message_draft d ON d.chat_id = c.chat_id
            ORDER BY
                d.updated_at DESC,
                (SELECT timestamp
                    FROM message
                    WHERE chat_id = c.chat_id
                    ORDER BY timestamp DESC
                    LIMIT 1
                ) DESC;
